info.name: YouTube Video Dim - KMV
info.description:
Simple script to dim the light output on YouTube videos by 25%.

Designed to complement my YouTube Black Theme;
https://userstyles.org/styles/174767/

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/

Source of screenshot;
https://youtu.be/pp95UwZGD8Y
info.additionalInfo:
20200426 Switched dim-method from Opacity to Brightness.
20200523 Added dimming to Preview Images on embedded YT videos on external webpages.
20200811 Implemented "!important" to compensate for a new setting on main theme.
